WorkItem.Description:
To use this class with very old (V5) xls files change the method "LastColumn" in the class "XlsBiffDimensions" to:
```
get { return (isV8) ? (ushort)((base.ReadUInt16(0x9) >> 8) + 1) : (ushort)(base.ReadUInt16(0x6) + 1); }
```

not fully tested, but works with simple (string, integer, date) xls files.
WorkItem.Summary: Excel Data Reader - handle version 5 xls files
